item.title: Deno - first impression
item.description: Deno is a new secure runtime for javascript and typescript created by Ryan Dahl, the original author of NodeJS. Recently Deno 1.0.0 was released and this is my first impression about it. Meet Deno Deno is a new secure Typescript and Javascript runtime. Yes similar to our loving NodeJS. Deno was created by Ryan Dahl the original author of NodeJS. Deno is written in Rust, Tokio and Typescript using V8 under the hood.
